name: Javen Qinfeng Shi
content: Books by Professor Javen Shi | Be Cause & Seven Wisdoms Professor Javen Qinfeng Shi Author of Be Cause: You Are the Cause! & Seven Wisdoms for Success Director, Causal AI Group Â· Interim Director, Responsible AI Research Centre (RAIR) Director of Advanced Reasoning and Learning, Australian Institute for Machine Learning (AIML) Professor, University of Adelaide ðŸ“– New Book Release: Seven Wisdoms for Success A practical guide to becoming the true cause of your success. This companion to Be Cause: You Are the Cause! distills its rich insights into seven actionable wisdoms for immediate application. Whether mastering inner patterns, aligning with your Dharma, or transforming fear into purpose, this guide is your portable source of success and clarity. Available now on Amazon: Buy Paperback Buy Kindle ðŸ“– Book: Be Cause: You Are the Cause! A transformative guide to causality, destiny, and self-mastery. In Be Cause: You Are the Cause!, Professor Javen Qinfeng Shi reveals the hidden laws that shape our livesâ€”blending cutting-edge AI, spiritual wisdom, and metaphysical insights. Perfect for readers of self-help, metaphysics, and consciousness studies who seek to master their destiny. Available now on Amazon: Buy Paperback (AU) Buy Hardcover (US) Buy Kindle (AU) News Sept 2025: Congratulations to Yichao and Yuhang (equal contribution) et al. for their spotlight paper, On the Value of Cross-Modal Misalignment in Multimodal Representation Learning, and to Zhen et al. for Solving the Asymmetric Traveling Salesman Problem via Trace-Guided Cost Augmentation, both accepted to NeurIPS 2025. Sept 2025: Published Seven Wisdoms for Success on Amazon. Sept 2025: Published Be Cause: You Are the Cause! on Amazon. Aug 2025: ACM SIGIR 2025 Test of Time Award Winner Research Professor Javen Qinfeng Shi is a scientist and mystic bridging cutting-edge AI with the inner mysteries of consciousness. His research spans causality, AI, mind, and metaphysics. He is a recipient of the ACM SIGIR 2025 Test of Time Award and the Open Catalyst Challenge at NeurIPS AI for Science 2023, where his team used AI to discover new energy materials. Beyond the lab, Professor Shi walks the path of a mystic. In Be Cause: You Are the Cause! and Seven Wisdoms for Success, he offers a vision for the Aquarian Ageâ€”awakening humanity as conscious co-creators, blending scientific brilliance with spiritual wisdom to transform personal destiny and collective evolution. ðŸŽ¤ Invite Me to Speak Please share your event details and speaking fee budget below: Your Name: Organization / Event: Email: Event Date: Speaking Fee Budget (USD or AUD): Message / Additional Details: Submit Request Contact ðŸ“§ Email: javen.shi [at] adelaide.edu.au
